text:
Holy crap. Trump reportedly offered “large sums of money” to get exclusive access to a #coronavirus vaccine being developed by a German company. He tried to get the company to move its research wing to the U.S. and develop the vaccine “for the U.S. only.”
https://t.co/NnL3atXIEX
